name: Beat Bash
description:
Beat Bash is a rhythm game where you bash away at your keyboard to the beat. 

If the timing feels off, run the calibration again from the main menu

The song Rush was written by Of Far Different Nature and modified by Mischka Kamener. Used under the CC-BY 4.0 licence. For details on the license see https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode.

For more work by Of Far Different Nature visit https://fardifferent.carrd.co/

---

This game was created in a week
